ModuleDescription: Students are required to write an academic thesis on an approved topic under the guidance of a supervisor. The HT will be equivalent to two modules of study.
Prerequisite:
Cohort 2011 and before:
Completed 110 MCs including 60 MCs of JS major requirements with a minimum SJAP of 4.00 and CAP of 3.50. Cohort 2012-2015:
Completed 110 MCs including 60 MCs of JS major requirements with a minimum CAP of 3.50. Cohort 2016 onwards:
Completed 110 MCs including 44 MCs of JS major requirements with a minimum CAP of 3.50.
